verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
There's a new name
written down in glory,

And it's mine.
O yes, it's mine!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
And the white-robed angels
sing the story,
"A sinner has come home."

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
For there's a new name
written down in glory,

And it's mine,
O yes it's mine.

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
With my sins forgiven
I am bound for heaven,
Nevermore to roam.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I was once a sinner,
but I came

Pardon to receive
from my Lord.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
This was freely given
and I found

That He always
kept His word.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I was humbly kneeling
at the Cross,

Fearing naught
but God's angry frown,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
When the heavens opened
and I saw

That my name
was written down.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
In the Book 'tis written
"Saved by grace."

O the joy that cam
to my soul!

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Now I am forgiven
and I know,

By the blood
I am made whole.
